short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and restore the state of your tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension will save your life when you have many tabs open on different topics, you can save tab states instead of keeping them open, this will damage your computer's battery and use a lot of RAM. It's very simple to use, you can name each tab slot, then hit the load button to save all available open tabs in that slot. Click restore and it will remove all existing tabs and open the saved tabs in order.
